# Indoor Climbing in Central London

[Opening times](https://londonclimbingcentres.co.uk/londonclimbingcentres.co.uk#opening-times)

[Climbing for kids](https://londonclimbingcentres.co.uk/londonclimbingcentres.co.uk#eustonwall-kids)

## Your first climb

It’s so easy to start climbing, with multiple options for those new to the sport.

Join a Bouldering Basics class, where an experienced instructor will cover basic techniques and safety tips for an hour.

Or you’re welcome to drop in and try it for yourself independently, once you’ve watched our online induction video and answered a few basic safety questions.

**50% OFF Bouldering Basics sessions, use code SUMMER50**

[Options for your first visit](https://londonclimbingcentres.co.uk/londonclimbingcentres.co....
